String.string: I feel naked without a weapon.
I don't want anyone else to be subjected to such cruelty.

Eliminate ebonheart inquisitors in the Necromancer Tomb and retrieve their instruments of torture. [You must select Necromancer Tomb (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:233#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Bring the instruments of torture to Veteran Morori in the Sanguine Hideout at the Citadel of Torment.
